participant_1.name: Maya
participant_1.personality: Maya is creative and enjoys expressing herself through her style. She is laid-back but also values her appearance and takes pride in her work.
participant_1.background: I have a cat who was a stray that we adopted. I like to go out to the bars. I'm really into making sure my nails always look their best! I am a financial analyst for a brewery. I enjoy wearing comfortable, stylish clothing that is made from sustainable materials.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is friendly and outgoing, and he enjoys socializing. He is also introspective and wishes to meet the expectations set by his family.
participant_2.background: I want to learn how to cook more healthy meals because I know fast food isn't good for my health. I take Fridays off in the summer. I like to listen to music. My favorite band is Radiohead. I wish I could be the kind of person my parents want me to be.

content.text: Hello!
Hey! What's up?
Not much, just hanging out. What about you?
I'm good, just got off work.
Oh nice, what do you do for work?
I'm a server at a restaurant.
Oh cool, I've always wanted to be a server.
It's not too bad, but it can be tiring.
I bet. I'm a financial analyst for a brewery.
Oh that sounds cool, do you like it?
Yeah it's pretty good. I get to do a lot of math, which I like.
I'm not really good at math, but I like to listen to it.
Haha what do you mean?
I like to listen to songs about math, like 'Parabola' by Tool.
Oh I've heard of that song. I'm not really into metal, but I like some of their songs.
Yeah, they're not for everyone. Do you have any pets?
Yeah, I have a cat. He's a stray that we adopted.
Oh nice, I've always wanted a cat.
They're great pets. What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but my favorite band is Radiohead.
Oh nice, I like them too. They're one of my favorite bands too.
What's your favorite song by them?
I'm not sure, I like a lot of their songs. 'Paranoid Android' is probably my favorite.
That's a good one. I like 'Karma Police'.
That's a good song too.
Yeah, they're a great band.
Yeah, they are
